Utterance: Hi! It’s great to see you again. How have you been since our last session?
Hi, Ellie! I’ve been pretty good. I actually wrote my story for the website!
That’s amazing! How did that process go for you?
It was a bit emotional, but I felt really good afterward. It was nice to reflect on my journey.
I’m glad to hear that! Reflecting on your experiences can be therapeutic. How do you feel about sharing that story with others now?
I feel excited! I think it adds a personal touch to my website.
Absolutely! Personal stories can resonate deeply with others. Have you had a chance to add any photos to your website yet?
Yes, I uploaded a few of my favorite nature shots. I think they complement the story well.
That sounds wonderful! It must feel rewarding to see your hard work come together. How has the response been from your friends or family about the updates?
They’ve been really supportive! A couple of them even offered to share my website with their networks.
That’s fantastic! Building a support network can really help in getting your work noticed. Have you thought about how you might promote your website further?
I’m thinking about using social media more actively, maybe doing a little campaign to share my work.
That sounds like a great idea! Social media can be a powerful tool for reaching a wider audience. How do you feel about creating that campaign?
I’m a bit nervous about putting myself out there, but I think it’s worth it.
It’s natural to feel nervous, but remember that you’re sharing something you’re passionate about. What would you say to someone else who might feel the same way?
I would tell them to embrace their passion and just go for it!
Exactly! Embracing your passion can lead to wonderful opportunities. How can you apply that encouragement to yourself as you move forward?
I guess I should remind myself that it’s okay to take risks and that not everyone will judge me.
That’s a healthy mindset! Taking risks can lead to growth and new connections. Is there anything else you’d like to discuss today?
I’ve been feeling a bit overwhelmed with everything, though. Juggling the website, my finances, and parenting can be a lot.
It sounds like you have a lot on your plate. How are you managing those feelings of overwhelm?
I’ve been trying to take breaks and focus on one thing at a time, but it’s still tough.
It’s great that you’re recognizing the need for breaks. Have you thought about any specific self-care practices you could incorporate into your routine?
I’ve been meaning to get back into meditation. I used to find it really helpful.
Meditation can be a wonderful way to center yourself. How about setting a goal to practice meditation a few times this week?
That sounds doable. I’ll aim for at least three sessions.
Perfect! Remember, self-care is essential, especially when you’re managing multiple responsibilities. I’m looking forward to hearing about your experiences next time.
Thank you, Ellie. I appreciate your support.
You’re welcome! Keep up the great work, and see you next time!
Bye!
